verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto them When a man כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> When יַפְלִ֖א <S%H6381><s%> shall make a singular נֶ֑דֶר <S%H5088><s%> vow בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <S%H6187><s%> by thy estimation נְפָשֹׁ֖ת <S%H5315><s%> the persons לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [shall be] for the LORD

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <S%H6187><s%> And thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> shall be of the male מִבֶּן֙ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> even unto sixty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> then עֶרְכְּךָ֗ <S%H6187><s%> even thy estimation חֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> shall be fifty שֶׁ֥קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נְקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> And if it [be] a female הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> then עֶרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H6187><s%> then thy estimation שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> shall be thirty שָֽׁקֶל׃ <S%H8255><s%> shekels

וְאִ֨ם <S%H518><s%> If מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חָמֵ֜שׁ <S%H2568><s%> And if [it be] from five שָׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> even unto twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> then עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <S%H6187><s%> then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> shall be of the male עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty שְׁקָלִ֑ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> and for the female עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <S%H8255><s%> shekels

וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> if מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חֹ֗דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> And if [it be] from a month וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> even unto five שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> then עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <S%H6187><s%> then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> shall be of the male חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> five שְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְלַנְּקֵבָ֣ה <S%H5347><s%> and for the female עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <S%H6187><s%> thy estimation שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> [shall be] three שְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> of silver

וְ֠אִם <S%H518><s%> If מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שִׁשִּׁ֨ים <S%H8346><s%> And if [it be] from sixty שָׁנָ֤ה <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֙עְלָה֙ <S%H4605><s%> and above אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> if [it be] a male וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> then עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <S%H6187><s%> then thy estimation חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁ֑קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> and for the female עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H6235><s%> ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <S%H8255><s%> shekels

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מָ֥ךְ <S%H4134><s%> But if he be poorer הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מֵֽעֶרְכֶּ֔ךָ <S%H6187><s%> than thy estimation וְהֶֽעֱמִידוֹ֙ <S%H5975><s%> then he shall present לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> himself before הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְהֶעֱרִ֥יךְ <S%H6186><s%> shall value אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֗י <S%H6310><s%> him according to אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after תַּשִּׂיג֙ <S%H5381><s%> ability יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> who הַנֹּדֵ֔ר <S%H5087><s%> that vowed יַעֲרִיכֶ֖נּוּ <S%H6186><s%> value הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> shall the priest ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> now if בְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> And if [it be] a beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> whereof men bring מִמֶּ֛נָּה <S%H4480><s%> as קָרְבָּ֖ן <S%H7133><s%> an offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> any אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> such יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> all that [any man] giveth מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of such unto the LORD יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> shall be holy

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַחֲלִיפֶ֗נּוּ <S%H2498><s%> He shall not alter וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or יָמִ֥יר <S%H4171><s%> it nor change אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> it a good בְּרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> for a bad אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> or a bad בְּט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for a good וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הָמֵ֨ר <S%H4171><s%> and if he shall at all יָמִ֤יר <S%H4171><s%> change בְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> beast בִּבְהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> for beast וְהָֽיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall become ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and its וּתְמוּרָת֖וֹ <S%H8545><s%> then it and the exchange יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> thereof shall be holy

וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> If כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> is any בְּהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> beast טְמֵאָ֔ה <S%H2931><s%> And if [it be] any unclean אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> of which they do not offer מִמֶּ֛נָּה <S%H4480><s%> as קָרְבָּ֖ן <S%H7133><s%> a sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְהֶֽעֱמִ֥יד <S%H5975><s%> then he shall present אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> the beast לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וְהֶעֱרִ֤יךְ <S%H6186><s%> shall value הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> it whether ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> it be good וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> or רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> bad כְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <S%H6187><s%> as thou valuest הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> it [who art] the priest כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if גָּאֹ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> But if he will at all יִגְאָלֶ֑נָּה <S%H1350><s%> redeem וְיָסַ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> it then he shall add חֲמִישִׁת֖וֹ <S%H2549><s%> a fifth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of עֶרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H6187><s%> [part] thereof unto thy estimation

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And when a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now if יַקְדִּ֨שׁ <S%H6942><s%> shall sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית֥וֹ <S%H1004><s%> his house קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> [to be] holy לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְהֶעֱרִיכוֹ֙ <S%H6186><s%> shall estimate הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> then the priest בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> either ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> it whether it be good וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> or רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> or bad כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲרִ֥יךְ <S%H6186><s%> shall estimate אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> as the priest כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> it so shall it stand

וְאִ֨ם־ <S%H518><s%> if הַמַּקְדִּ֔ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> And if he that sanctified יִגְאַ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> it will redeem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> his house וְ֠יָסַף <S%H3254><s%> then he shall add חֲמִישִׁ֧ית <S%H2549><s%> the fifth כֶּֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> [part] of the money עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <S%H6187><s%> of thy estimation עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְהָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become לֽוֹ׃

וְאִ֣ם ׀ <S%H518><s%> if מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> [some part] of a field אֲחֻזָּת֗וֹ <S%H272><s%> of his possession יַקְדִּ֥ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> shall sanctify אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And if a man לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> then עֶרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H6187><s%> then thy estimation לְפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> shall be according זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> to the seed זֶ֚רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed חֹ֣מֶר <S%H2563><s%> thereof an homer שְׂעֹרִ֔ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> [shall be valued] at fifty שֶׁ֥קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> of silver

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מִשְּׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> from the year הַיֹּבֵ֖ל <S%H3104><s%> of jubile יַקְדִּ֣ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> If he sanctify שָׂדֵ֑הוּ <S%H7704><s%> his field כְּעֶרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H6187><s%> according to thy estimation יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> it shall stand

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> after הַיֹּבֵל֮ <S%H3104><s%> the jubile יַקְדִּ֣ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> But if he sanctify שָׂדֵהוּ֒ <S%H7704><s%> his field וְחִשַּׁב־ <S%H2803><s%> shall reckon ל֨וֹ הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> then the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> unto him the money עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> according to הַשָּׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> the years הַנּ֣וֹתָרֹ֔ת <S%H3498><s%> that remain עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> even unto the year הַיֹּבֵ֑ל <S%H3104><s%> of the jubile וְנִגְרַ֖ע <S%H1639><s%> and it shall be abated מֵֽעֶרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H6187><s%> from thy estimation

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If גָּאֹ֤ל <S%H1350><s%> will in any wise יִגְאַל֙ <S%H1350><s%> redeem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> the field הַמַּקְדִּ֖ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> And if he that sanctified אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְ֠יָסַף <S%H3254><s%> it then he shall add חֲמִשִׁ֧ית <S%H2549><s%> the fifth כֶּֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> [part] of the money עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <S%H6187><s%> of thy estimation עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> unto וְקָ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> unto it and it shall be assured לֽוֹ׃

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> may no יִגְאַל֙ <S%H1350><s%> And if he will not redeem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> the field וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מָכַ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> or if he have sold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> the field לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> to another לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> may no יִגָּאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> it shall not be redeemed עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <S%H7704><s%> But the field בְּצֵאת֣וֹ <S%H3318><s%> when it goeth out בַיֹּבֵ֗ל <S%H3104><s%> in the jubile קֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> shall be holy לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> as a field הַחֵ֑רֶם <S%H2764><s%> devoted לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> thereof shall be the priest's תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H272><s%> the possession

וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> if אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> a field מִקְנָת֔וֹ <S%H4736><s%> which he hath bought אֲשֶׁ֕ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> A part מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> which [is] not of the fields אֲחֻזָּת֑וֹ <S%H272><s%> of his possession יַקְדִּ֖ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> And if [a man] sanctify לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְחִשַּׁב־ <S%H2803><s%> shall reckon ל֣וֹ הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> Then the priest אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> מִכְסַ֣ת <S%H4373><s%> unto him the worth הָֽעֶרְכְּךָ֔ <S%H6187><s%> of thy estimation עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> up שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> [even] unto the year הַיֹּבֵ֑ל <S%H3104><s%> of the jubile וְנָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> and he shall give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֶרְכְּךָ֙ <S%H6187><s%> thine estimation בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> as קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [as] a holy thing לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> In the year הַיּוֹבֵל֙ <S%H3104><s%> of the jubile יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall return הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> the field לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom קָנָ֖הוּ <S%H7069><s%> unto him of whom it was bought מֵאִתּ֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> לַאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to whom ל֖וֹ אֲחֻזַּ֥ת <S%H272><s%> [even] to him to whom the possession הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <S%H6187><s%> And all thy estimations יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be after בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shall be according to the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty גֵּרָ֖ה <S%H1626><s%> gerahs יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַשָּֽׁקֶל׃ <S%H8255><s%> shall be the shekel ס

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> However בְּכ֞וֹר <S%H1060><s%> Only the firstling אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְבֻכַּ֤ר <S%H1069><s%> firstling לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which should be the LORD'S בִּבְהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> of the beasts לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַקְדִּ֥ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> shall sanctify אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> no man אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> it whether [it be] ox אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or שֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> or sheep לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> it [is] the LORD'S הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאִ֨ם <S%H518><s%> if בַּבְּהֵמָ֤ה <S%H929><s%> beast הַטְּמֵאָה֙ <S%H2931><s%> And if [it be] of an unclean וּפָדָ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> then he shall redeem בְעֶרְכֶּ֔ךָ <S%H6187><s%> [it] according to thine estimation וְיָסַ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> and shall add חֲמִשִׁת֖וֹ <S%H2549><s%> a fifth עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> of וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not יִגָּאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> [part] of it thereto or if it be not redeemed וְנִמְכַּ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> then it shall be sold בְּעֶרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H6187><s%> according to thy estimation

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything חֵ֡רֶם <S%H2764><s%> Notwithstanding no devoted thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יַחֲרִם֩ <S%H2763><s%> shall devote אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that a man לַֽיהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> God מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ל֗וֹ מֵאָדָ֤ם <S%H120><s%> of all that he hath [both] of man וּבְהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> and beast וּמִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> and of the field אֲחֻזָּת֔וֹ <S%H272><s%> of his possession לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִמָּכֵ֖ר <S%H4376><s%> shall be sold וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִגָּאֵ֑ל <S%H1350><s%> or redeemed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Anything חֵ֕רֶם <S%H2764><s%> every devoted thing קֹֽדֶשׁ־ <S%H6944><s%> [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֥ים <S%H6944><s%> holy ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> one חֵ֗רֶם <S%H2764><s%> None devoted אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who יָחֳרַ֛ם <S%H2763><s%> devoted מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> among הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of men לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> which shall be יִפָּדֶ֑ה <S%H6299><s%> shall be redeemed מ֖וֹת <S%H4191><s%> [but] shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעְשַׂ֨ר <S%H4643><s%> And all the tithe הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִזֶּ֤רַע <S%H2233><s%> [whether] of the seed הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> [or] of the fruit הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> of the tree לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD'S ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> it קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [it is] holy לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If גָּאֹ֥ל <S%H1350><s%> will at all יִגְאַ֛ל <S%H1350><s%> redeem אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man מִמַּֽעַשְׂר֑וֹ <S%H4643><s%> [ought] of his tithes חֲמִשִׁית֖וֹ <S%H2549><s%> thereto the fifth יֹסֵ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> he shall add עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> For

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מַעְשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> And concerning the tithe בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> of the herd וָצֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> or of the flock כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> every אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> [even] of whatsoever passeth תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑בֶט <S%H7626><s%> under the rod הָֽעֲשִׂירִ֕י <S%H6224><s%> the tenth יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become קֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> shall be holy לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְבַקֵּ֛ר <S%H1239><s%> He shall not search בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> whether ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> whether it be good לָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> or bad וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְמִירֶ֑נּוּ <S%H4171><s%> neither shall he change וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הָמֵ֣ר <S%H4171><s%> it and if he change יְמִירֶ֔נּוּ <S%H4171><s%> it at all וְהָֽיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall become ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> and its וּתְמוּרָת֛וֹ <S%H8545><s%> then both it and the change יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall become קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> thereof shall be holy לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִגָּאֵֽל׃ <S%H1350><s%> it shall not be redeemed

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַמִּצְוֹ֗ת <S%H4687><s%> These [are] the commandments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּהַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> Sinai
